full_text: From @WSJopinion: At 90 years old, William Shatner became the oldest man in space—and on his return showed a sense of raw wonder that would do Captain James Tiberius Kirk proud https://t.co/AzKnlJZs1B

localize.full_text: @WSJopinionより。90歳で最高齢の宇宙飛行士となったウィリアム・シャトナーは、帰還時にジェームズ・ティベリウス・カーク船長が誇りに思うような生の驚きを見せた https://t.co/AzKnlJZs1B
